profile_summary: As a Senior Finance Systems Engineer with 8+ years of software engineering experience, I bring expertise in **NetSuite**, **Advanced Revenue Management**, and **Zuora**, ensuring seamless integration and optimization of financial systems. I excel in **project management**, **stakeholder management**, and understand **accounting principles** to align technology solutions with business objectives. My technical proficiency includes **GitHub**, which enhances collaboration and version control in software development. Additionally, I possess a strong background in building applications using **Python** (FastAPI, Django, Flask, SQLAlchemy) and frontend frameworks like **Angular**, **Vue**, **React**, and **Next.js**. My cloud experience includes **AWS** and **Azure**, complemented by database management skills in **PostgreSQL**, **MySQL**, and **MongoDB**. I specialize in designing high-performance architectures, employing **microservices** and **REST/gRPC API** development to meet industry standards and deliver enterprise-grade solutions.
